name: browser-terminal-extension
description: Extension that allows you to open a native shell in the browser

scripts.start: npm run build_native && npm run native-manifest install && npm run extension start; npm run native-manifest uninstall
scripts.start:firefox: npm run build_native && npm run native-manifest install:firefox && npm run extension start:firefox; npm run native-manifest uninstall:firefox
scripts.start:chrome: npm run build_native && npm run native-manifest install:chrome && npm run extension start:chrome; npm run native-manifest uninstall:chrome
scripts.start:chromium: npm run build_native && npm run native-manifest install:chromium && npm run extension start:chromium; npm run native-manifest uninstall:chromium
